channel.title: submodules on TDD-Coach
channel.description: Recent content in submodules on TDD-Coach

item.title: Setting up this website
item.description: When I set this blog up I struggled a bit with git and its submodule feature. I used git version 2.26.2. Here is my experience. Exchange a Git Submodule When using Hugo with themes Git submodules come into play. This blog uses the minimal theme. When I set it up, I used the original theme. Later I decided to fork the theme’s repo to make adjustments. The submodule was already in place and I wanted to exchange the source of the submodule.
